name: GoBlaster
description:
GoBlaster is a small, bullet-hell score-chasing game where you can always beat your personal best. Use powerups to blast through enemies while dodging their overwhelming attacks, and over time unlock new playable ships.

GAMEPLAY


  • Your ship must survive an endless onslaught of procedural (and hand placed) blood thirsty space pirates.
  • Get to level 20 and beat the final boss, then try to survive!
  • Along the way, grab weapon power-ups and increase your health by defeating enemies.
  • Use your ships special ability to defend yourself and survive!
  • Unlock new ships by surviving past certain levels.

DEV NOTE


I appreciate feedback and aim to support and improve my games. Use the feedback button in game to send me requests, bugs or just to say hello!

Thanks for reading and checking out my game. Enjoy!
James Lowrey - Jarware Games
